identity.name: FieldOS v1 - The Digital Jobsite
identity.core_philosophy: Fusion of Industrial Safety Signage + Architectural Blueprints. Functional, rugged, high-contrast, and precise.
design_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix construction aesthetics with SaaS usability.
Content is King: Data density for dispatchers, big buttons for field techs.
Contrast: High visibility is a safety requirement, not just a style.
Negative Space: Use it to group functional areas, not just for air.

usage.headings: Chivo, font-weight: 700/900, tracking-tight, uppercase for top-level headers.
usage.data_display: JetBrains Mono, font-weight: 500, for IDs, prices, and timestamps.
usage.ui_elements: Manrope, font-weight: 600, for buttons and navigation.

colors.mode_strategy: Smart Hybrid: Light Mode for Field Techs (Sunlight visibility), Dark Mode for Dispatchers (Eye strain reduction).

visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid var(--border). Use 'border-l-4' for status indicators on cards.
visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-md for dropdowns. Avoid large diffuse shadows; keep them tight and mechanical.
visual_enhancers.radius: rounded-md (6px) - Avoid fully rounded 'pill' shapes for containers; keep it structural.
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise texture on sidebar backgrounds to mimic concrete/matte finish.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use sparingly. Only for sticky headers: bg-background/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b.

layout.spacing: Generous padding inside containers (p-6), tight gaps between related data points (gap-2).

container_styles.dashboard_card: bg-card border border-border rounded-md shadow-sm p-6 flex flex-col
container_styles.list_item: flex items-center justify-between p-4 border-b border-border hover:bg-muted/50 transition-colors
container_styles.page_header: flex flex-col md:flex-row md:items-center justify-between gap-4 mb-8

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-sm font-semibold uppercase tracking-wide text-xs h-10 px-4 rounded-md
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 font-medium h-10 px-4 rounded-md
buttons.outline: border-2 border-input bg-background hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground font-medium h-10 px-4 rounded-md
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-muted hover:text-foreground font-medium h-10 px-4 rounded-md

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building FieldOS. It must feel like a high-end power tool. Robust, reliable, and fast.
layout_rules: Use the 'Control Room Grid' for dashboards: Dense data, clear hierarchy.
Use 'Big Button' layouts for mobile views (technician interface).
Always use 'Manrope' for UI text and 'Chivo' for Headings.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for any ID, Order Number, Price, or Timestamp.
component_rules: Customize Shadcn components to match the 'Industrial Safety' theme.
theme_implementation: Implement the color palette in 'tailwind.config.js' and 'index.css'.
Ensure dark mode is 'slate' based, not pure black.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic gradients, no centered text blocks without purpose.
Create depth: Use z-index and subtle borders to create layers.
Micro-animations: Every button press, hover, and toggle must have feedback.
Spacing: Use 2x more padding than you think is necessary for 'breathing room' in the UI, but keep data grids dense.
No Emoji Icons: Use Lucide icons only.
Accessibility: Ensure contrast ratios are met (APCA preferred).
